description:
Open your very own dealership and build a car empire.
Satisfy customers’ needs and make a profit to expand your business!
Face business challenges and LEARN entrepreneurship.
How to play:
🚗 Buy used cars on auctions or from used-car sellers.
🚗 Talk to your customers about cars they want - find what they like.
🚗 Select the best fitting car and start dealing!
🚗 Get rich - earn respect - buy better cars and upgrade them - make your business grow!
Used Car Dealer provides a unique business management experience. Throughout the game, you will learn how to read clients' needs and barter effectively! The algorithm implemented within the game is based on real car market simulation and is ever-changing.
Some of the game features:
🚗 Wide range of cars available to buy
🚗 Parking lot system
🚗 Unique bartering algorithm
🚗 Mini-game
🚗 Evolving upgrade system (for now - repainting)
